EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal_Roadshow_Q416.Reminder - Denver - 11-17-16
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Cloud-Native Roadshow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Cloud-Native Roadshow taking place tomorrow in Denver. We look forward to seeing you there!
Pivotal Cloud-Native Roadshow—Denver, CO Friday, November 18, 2016
8:30am – 9:30am Breakfast 9:30am – 12:00pm Sessions 12:00pm – 1:00pm Lunch 1:00pm – 3:30pm Sessions Roadshow Agenda <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/denver]]>
Location: History Colorado Center <[[http://www.historycolorado.org/]]> Colorado Room 1200 Broadway Denver, CO 80203 Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/History+Colorado+Center/@39.7356665,-104.9888947,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x876c7f2a94319b1f:0x8959e1089da28aec!8m2!3d39.7356624!4d-104.986706]]>
Parking: The Civic Center Cultural Complex garage is located directly across the street from the History Colorado Center at 12th Avenue and Broadway.
Questions? Contact Jamie De Martini at jdemartini@pivotal.io <[[mailto:jdemartini@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you tomorrow!
The Pivotal Team
